root.name: Anvil of Dawn
root.description: OverviewAfter waking up in a dungeon, the game quickly sets the tone and pace of the story by familiarizing you with the basic premise of the story. A kingdom in peril and an evil warlord that goes postal. The game lets you pick from various classes (including one lizard) and magic schools. Over the course of the game the character has more opportunities to be customized as well as equipping himself with all sorts of loot and weapons. The dungeon crawler follows the traditional formula, mixing combat and pixelhunting puzzles, as well as an Auto-Map feature.
